docs.text: Regional Focal Mechanisms This repository contains scripts to run Herrmann's focal mechanism codes described in Herrmann et al. (2011) Reference: Herrmann, R. B.; Benz, H.; Ammon, C. J. Monitoring the Earthquake Source Process in North America. Bulletin of the Seismological Society of America 2011, 101 (6), 2609–2625. .
